channel.title: Own Project on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in Own Project on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: Marketing Robot
item.description: TL; DR Outsourcing R&D project for the Retentioneering company – Reinforcement Learning for automatic budget management for advertising campaigns. We managed to create a quality MVP. NDA. Yandex Direct img. My team Me. Olga – MEPhI graduate, postgraduate student of the Institute of Theoretical and Experimental Physics (ITEP) in elementary particle physics, machine learning specialist, programmer.. My role Searching for a client Management Programming (python) Environment Reinforcement Learning Simulator … Statistical analysis of approaches, selection and analysis of metrics

item.title: For All Exists Infinity
item.description: Description VR installation created with the Unreal Engine. Two actors coexist, you and AI, representing previous users. You are able to influence the virtual world, creating traces of presence or artistic images. These traces are a way of communication with artificial intelligence, through joint creativity you can explore the virtual space. You have no means of communication with your ally other than creation. How to behave in an environment where basic familiar communication methods are not provided?
